jump_scares.spoiler: Rachel sees a girl huddled in the corner of cell 6
Sgt. MacReady looks in the rear view mirror and sees the mysterious man in the back seat  his eyes are white
Jack sees some blood dripping on the floor, he looks up and sees some legs dangling in front of him
Sgt. MacReady sees the mysterious man’s reflection in the mirror
During a flashback, Caesar hits a young woman with his car and her face suddenly appears on the windscreen
Jack bursts through a door and attacks the doctor
A sudden scene cut to a man impaled through the eye may startle some viewers
